content: a skein of three irish girls springvale worsted in brandy alexander available at stars hol- low yarns us size 8 5 mm kni cid 427 ng needles you can use either straight needles or circulars common no cid 415 ons such as a cable needle measuring tape yarn needle scissors etc 20 around 51 cm x 3 5 9 cm wide a cid 332 er seaming and gently wet blocking 20 sts x 28 row = 4 in stockine cid 425 e s cid 415 tch ws/rs wrong side/right side st s s cid 415 tches k knit p purl fc2 place the next 2 s cid 415 tches on a cable needle knit the next 2 s cid 415 tches then knit the 2 s cid 415 tches from the cable needle fc4 place the next 4 s cid 415 tches on a cable needle knit the next 4 s cid 415 tches then knit the 4 s cid 415 tches from the cable needle a b c d e the example shown is an fc4 cable for an fc2 cable you will follow the same instruc cid 415 ons but in- stead of 4 s cid 415 tches you will use 2 work to the cabling sec cid 415 on as shown in photo a next place the next 4 s cid 415 tches onto your cable nee- dle as shown in photo b holding the cable needle in front of your work knit the next 4 s cid 415 tches as shown in photo c next knit the s cid 415 tches off of the cable needle as shown in photo d now your front cross cable is complete as shown in photo e congrats you just learned a new s cid 415 tch cast on 24 sts using your preferred cast on method i used the long tail cast on row 1 and all odd row ws k2 p4 k2 p8 k2 p4 k2 row 2 4 8 10 14 and 16 rs k6 p2 k8 p2 k6 row 6 k2 fc2 p2 k8 p2 fc2 k2 row 12 work as for row 6 row 18 k6 p2 fc4 p2 k6 repeat row 1-18 six more cid 415 mes ending on row 17 on the final repeat your work should measure approx 20 51 cm long bind off and cut yarn leaving a 12 tail and gently wet block make sure not to stretch it lengthwise or it might become too big we really just want to open up the cable s cid 415 tches and help the piece lay flat when your headband is fully dry carefully seam the ends together s cid 415 tch for s cid 415 tch then weave in all ends you ve now completed your very own favorite cable headband i hope you enjoyed this fun kni cid 427 ng pa cid 425 ern be sure to sign up for our email
